name: This is how I relax
description:
Going on a relaxing walk with your dog!

Throw the ball with SPACE while "aiming" with the mouse.

The first round is always is the craziest press R to reset!

Scroll to zoom camera in and out.

Press Q to close the game.

Mady by Barsen & Orgsize

This is a GMTK Game Jam 2020 Submission (a game made in 48h)

Known issues:

First play unstable.

Can't rotate camera around player.

Dog stops abruptly if ball falls down the cliff.

Floating trees.

Falling trough the terrain.
